name: Aria's Cafe
description:
CONTROLS

WASD / Arrow keys for movement.

Click crops to harvest them. Each crop has a different growth speed; the slower the growth speed, the more recipes featuring that crop are worth!

Click on the recipe book in order to start the cooking mini game. You lose your ingredients when you fail, so be mindful of the timing!

Click on customers to summon them to your window. Customers will not come if you do not have any items in your inventory to sell.

PREMISE

Meet Aria, a young cafe owner.  In the heart of a sleepy little city, her cafe is known for using only the freshest of ingredients.  As a result, prices vary based on what's available and you may haggle with customers to get the price you deserve!

You never know who you'll meet with over 15 unique NPCs wandering city streets. Do your best to appeal to them and earn a hefty profit before the day ends! 

GAME JAM TEAM

3D/2D artist - fjshsoup

UI/UX and logo design - Sugi Loft
